member.name: T:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI
member.summary: API for computing bonuses granted by factors inside RecalculateStats.

member.name: P:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.Loaded
member.summary: Return true if the submodule is loaded.

member.name: T:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs
member.summary: A collection of modifiers for various stats. It will be passed down the event chain of GetStatCoefficients; add to the contained values to modify stats.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.baseHealthAdd
member.summary: Added to base health.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.levelHealthAdd
member.summary: Multiplied by character level and added to base health.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.healthMultAdd
member.summary: Added to the direct multiplier to base health.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.healthTotalMult
member.summary: Base health is multiplied by this number. Multiply this value by your multiplier.

members.member: Added to base shield. MAX_SHIELD ~ (BASE_SHIELD + baseShieldAdd + levelShieldAdd * ) * (SHIELD_MULT + shieldMultAdd) * shieldTotalMultremarks>

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.levelShieldAdd
member.summary: Multiplied by level and added to base shield.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.shieldMultAdd
member.summary: Added to the direct multiplier to shields.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.shieldTotalMult
member.summary: Base shield is multiplied by this number. Multiply this value by your multiplier.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.baseRegenAdd
member.summary: Added to base health regen.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.levelRegenAdd
member.summary: Multiplied by level and added to base health regen.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.regenMultAdd
member.summary: Added to the direct multiplier to base health regen.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.regenTotalMult
member.summary: Base health regen is multiplied by this number. Multiply this value by your multiplier.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.baseMoveSpeedAdd
member.summary: Added to base move speed.
member.remarks: MOVE_SPEED ~ (BASE_MOVE_SPEED + baseMoveSpeedAdd + levelMoveSpeedAdd * ) * (MOVE_SPEED_MULT + moveSpeedMultAdd) * moveSpeedTotalMult / (MOVE_SPEED_REDUCTION_MULT + moveSpeedReductionMultAdd)

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.levelMoveSpeedAdd
member.summary: Multiplied by level and added to base move speed.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.moveSpeedMultAdd
member.summary: Added to the direct multiplier to move speed.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.moveSpeedTotalMult
member.summary: Base move speed is multiplied by this number. Multiply this value by your multiplier.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.moveSpeedReductionMultAdd
member.summary: Added reduction multiplier to move speed.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.sprintSpeedAdd
member.summary: Added to the direct multiplier to sprinting speed.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.moveSpeedRootCount
member.summary: Amount of Root effects currently applied.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.baseJumpPowerAdd
member.summary: Added to base jump power.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.levelJumpPowerAdd
member.summary: Multiplied by level and added to base jump power.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.jumpPowerMultAdd
member.summary: Added to the direct multiplier to jump power.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.jumpPowerTotalMult
member.summary: Base jump power is multiplied by this number. Multiply this value by your multiplier.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.baseDamageAdd
member.summary: Added to base damage.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.levelDamageAdd
member.summary: Multiplied by level and added to base damage.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.damageMultAdd
member.summary: Added to the direct multiplier to base damage.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.damageTotalMult
member.summary: Base damage is multiplied by this number. Multiply this value by your multiplier.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.baseAttackSpeedAdd
member.summary: Added to attack speed.
member.remarks: ATTACK_SPEED ~ (BASE_ATTACK_SPEED + baseAttackSpeedAdd + levelAttackkSpeedAdd * ) * (ATTACK_SPEED_MULT + attackSpeedMultAdd) * attackSpeedTotalMult / (ATTACK_SPEED_REDUCTION_MULT + attackSpeedReductionMultAdd)

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.levelAttackSpeedAdd
member.summary: Multiplied by level and added to attack speed.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.attackSpeedMultAdd
member.summary: Added to the direct multiplier to attack speed.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.attackSpeedTotalMult
member.summary: Base attack speed is multiplied by this number. Multiply this value by your multiplier.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.attackSpeedReductionMultAdd
member.summary: Added reduction multiplier to attack speed.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.critAdd
member.summary: Added to crit chance.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.levelCritAdd
member.summary: Multiplied by level and added to crit chance.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.critTotalMult
member.summary: Crit chance is multiplied by this number. Multiply this value by your multiplier.

member.summary: Added to the direct multiplier to crit damage.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.critDamageTotalMult
member.summary: Crit damage is multiplied by this number. Multiply this value by your multiplier.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.bleedChanceAdd
member.summary: Added to bleed chance.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.bleedChanceMult
member.summary: Bleed chance is multiplied by this number. Multiply this value by your multiplier.

member.summary: Added to armor.

member.summary: Multiplied by level and added to armor.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.armorTotalMult
member.summary: Armor is multiplied by this number. Multiply this value by your multiplier.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.baseCurseAdd
member.summary: Added to Curse Penalty.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.curseTotalMult
member.summary: Curse penalty is multiplied by this number. Multiply this value by your multiplier.

member.summary: Stat modifiers applied to all skills.

member.summary: Stat modifiers applied to the primary skill.

member.summary: Stat modifiers applied to the secondary skill.

member.summary: Stat modifiers applied to the utility skill.

member.summary: Stat modifiers applied to the special skill.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.cooldownReductionAdd
member.summary: Added to flat cooldown reduction.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.cooldownMultAdd
member.summary: Added to the direct multiplier to cooldown timers.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.primaryCooldownMultAdd
member.summary: (Primary) Added to the direct multiplier to cooldown timers.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.secondaryCooldownMultAdd
member.summary: (Secondary) Added to the direct multiplier to cooldown timers.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.utilityCooldownMultAdd
member.summary: (Utility) Added to the direct multiplier to cooldown timers.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.specialCooldownMultAdd
member.summary: (Special) Added to the direct multiplier to cooldown timers.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.levelFlatAdd
member.summary: Added to the body's current level.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.levelMultAdd
member.summary: Added to the direct multiplier to level scaling.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.shouldFreezeBarrier
member.summary: Set to TRUE to freeze barrier decay.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.barrierDecayMult
member.summary: Multiply to increase or decrease barrier decay rate.
member.remarks: BARRIER_DECAY_RATE ~ (BASE_DECAY_RATE + barrierDecayAdd) * (barrierDecayMult). Cannot be less than 0.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.barrierDecayAdd
member.summary: ADD to increase or decrease barrier decay rate. Expressed as a rate per second.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.luckAdd
member.summary: Add to increase or decrease Luck. Can be negative.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.jumpCountAdd
member.summary: Added to max jump count.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventArgs.jumpCountMult
member.summary: Jump count is multiplied by this number.

member.name: T:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.SkillSlotStatModifiers
member.summary: A collection of modifiers for skill slots

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.SkillSlotStatModifiers.cooldownMultAdd
member.summary: Added to cooldown multiplier.
member.remarks: COOLDOWN ~ (BASE_COOLDOWN * BASE_COOLDOWN_MULT * (1 + cooldownMultAdd) / (1 + cooldownReductionMultAdd) * cooldownMultiplier) - (BASE_FLAT_REDUCTION + cooldownFlatReduction)

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.SkillSlotStatModifiers.cooldownReductionMultAdd
member.summary: Added to cooldown reduction multiplier.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.SkillSlotStatModifiers.cooldownFlatReduction
member.summary: Added to flat cooldown reduction.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.SkillSlotStatModifiers.cooldownMultiplier
member.summary: Multiplies the final cooldown (does not affect flat cooldown increase/reduction).

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.SkillSlotStatModifiers.bonusStockAdd
member.summary: Added to max stocks.

member.name: T:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.StatHookEventHandler
member.summary: Used as the delegate type for the GetStatCoefficients event.
member.param: The CharacterBody which RecalculateStats is being called for.
An instance of StatHookEventArgs, passed to each subscriber to this event in turn for modification.

member.name: E:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.GetStatCoefficients
member.summary: Subscribe to this event to modify one of the stat hooks which StatHookEventArgs covers. Fired during CharacterBody.RecalculateStats.

member.name: F:R2API.RecalculateStatsAPI.PluginVersion
member.summary: Version of the plugin, should be matching with the thunderstore package.

member.summary: Add a PluginVersion field to the attribut-ed class filled from the thunderstore.toml versionNumber field
